EmailTemplate.description: Template used to send case creation emails to customers for Security Express
EmailTemplate.name: Security Express Case Creation Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: New Case: Salesforce Case number {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for submitting the Security Express Request through the Startrack Website. A new case number has been generated in our system.
The reference Case number is: {!Case.CaseNumber}
You may also reply to this email with attachements if any further communications is required for this request.
Alternatively, you may also contact the Security Express team on below contact details by quoting your case number.
